div.p: Result of observing a high value (1.0%/decade) with only the CERES_CRF system (left) or observing a low value (0.1Â K/decade) with only the IAC system (right). The gray histogram is before measurement; the black histogram is after measurement. The left graphic has higher uncertainty (standard deviation 1.34) than before the measurement (standard deviation 1.24) illustrating negative learning
